articles.author: John Psaropoulos
articles.title: Should Russia pay Ukraine to rebuild – or even to defeat its own invasion? - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: The EU finds itself in uncharted legal territory as it ponders using Russia’s frozen assets against it.
articles.content:
Within days of invading Ukraine in February 2022, Russia lost control of the assets its central bank held in foreign currencies abroad.
Some $300bn was frozen in the European Union, United States, U… [+7422 chars]

articles.title: Nvidia Is Now a $2 Trillion-Dollar Company Thanks to AI Dominance - IGN
articles.description: Nvidia becomes the latest US company to reach the $2 trillion market cap, following Microsoft and Apple.
articles.content: Nvidia, the tech company best known for its gaming and graphics GPUs, has officially hit a $2 trillion market valuation, closing at the market cap for the first time today and becoming the first chip… [+1515 chars]
